sourcesContent:
<!-- BlogDetail.vue -->
<script>
export default {
  name: 'BlogDetail',
  data() {
    return {
      blogPost: {},
    };
  },
  created() {
    // Fetch the blog post based on the ID from route parameters
    const postId = this.$route.params.id;
    
    // Assuming you have an API or some data source to fetch the blog post
    // Replace this with your actual data fetching logic
    this.fetchBlogPost(postId);
  },
  methods: {
    fetchBlogPost(postId) {
      // Perform API call or fetch data as needed
      // Update this.blogPost with the fetched data
      // For example:
      // axios.get(`/api/blog/${postId}`).then(response => {
      //   this.blogPost = response.data;
      // });
    },
  },
};
</script>
